lead_paragraph: Dave Anderson is retiring as a regular Sports of The Times columnist, but he will not stop writing. In a kind of emeritus role, he will write at least 18 columns a year, most appearing on Sundays.
snippet: Dave Anderson is retiring as a regular Sports of The Times columnist, but he will not stop writing. In a kind of emeritus role, he will write at least 18 columns a year, most appearing on Sundays.
